statements: SELECT * FROM environmental_impact_assessments WHERE assessment_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, location FROM environmental_impact_assessments WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT assessment_date, project_name FROM environmental_impact_assessments WHERE assessment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM environmental_impact_assessments WHERE impact_description IS NULL;
SELECT project_name, location, assessment_date FROM environmental_impact_assessments WHERE assessment_date < NOW();
SELECT * FROM environmental_impact_assessments WHERE project_name = 'Project A'
SELECT assessment_id, project_name, location FROM environmental_impact_assessments WHERE location LIKE 'New%' ORDER BY assessment_date DESC
SELECT * FROM environmental_impact_assessments WHERE assessment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' LIMIT 10
SELECT project_name, COUNT(assessment_id) AS total_assessments FROM environmental_impact_assessments GROUP BY project_name ORDER BY total_assessments DESC
SELECT * FROM environmental_impact_assessments WHERE assessment_date < '2022-06-30' AND impact_description IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM environmental_impact_assessments;
SELECT id, project_name, location FROM environmental_impact_assessments WHERE location='New York';
SELECT project_name, assessment_date FROM environmental_impact_assessments ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM environmental_impact_assessments WHERE project_name LIKE '%Construction%';
SELECT project_name, location FROM environmental_impact_assessments WHERE assessment_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT project_name, location, assessment_date FROM environmental_impact_assessments WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT id, project_name, location, assessment_date FROM environmental_impact_assessments ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, location, assessment_date FROM environmental_impact_assessments WHERE assessment_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY assessment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM permit_requirements WHERE project_id = 101 ORDER BY permit_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM environmental_impact_assessments INNER JOIN permit_requirements ON environmental_impact_assessments.id = permit_requirements.project_id WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM environmental_impact_assessments;
SELECT eia_date, eia_location FROM environmental_impact_assessments WHERE eia_id = 1;
SELECT permit_description, validity_period FROM permit_requirements;
SELECT * FROM compliance_records WHERE compliance_status = 'Approved';
SELECT record_id, issue_date, comments FROM compliance_records ORDER BY issue_date DESC;
SELECT eia_id, eia_date, eia_location, eia_description FROM environmental_impact_assessments WHERE eia_location = 'City A';
SELECT * FROM permit_requirements WHERE validity_period > '2022-01-01';
SELECT record_id, issue_date, compliance_status FROM compliance_records WHERE compliance_status = 'Not Compliant';
SELECT eia_id, eia_location, eia_description FROM environmental_impact_assessments WHERE eia_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2023-01-01';
SELECT permit_id, permit_type, permit_description, validity_period FROM permit_requirements WHERE permit_type LIKE '%Construction%';
SELECT * FROM environmental_impact_assessment;
SELECT author_name, date FROM environmental_impact_assessment WHERE location='New York';
SELECT permit_id, issued_by, permit_type FROM permit_requirements WHERE issue_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM regulations WHERE category='Environmental';
SELECT company_name, address FROM company_details WHERE email='contact@company.com';
SELECT * FROM environmental_impact_assessment WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT author_name, DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date FROM environmental_impact_assessment WHERE author_name LIKE 'J%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM permit_requirements WHERE permit_type = 'Construction' AND expiration_date > CURDATE();
SELECT regulation_title, description FROM regulations WHERE category = 'Environmental' ORDER BY regulation_id ASC;
SELECT company_name, address, contact_person, email FROM company_details WHERE email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT project_name, assessment_date FROM environmental_impact_assessment;
SELECT * FROM environmental_impact_assessment WHERE assessed_by = 'John Doe';
SELECT project_name, location FROM environmental_impact_assessment WHERE id = 3;
SELECT assessment_id, category_id FROM assessment_categories;
SELECT * FROM project_permits WHERE permit_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM environmental_impact_assessment;
SELECT project_name, assessment_date, assessed_by FROM environmental_impact_assessment WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT project_name, assessment_date, assessment_result FROM environmental_impact_assessment WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM impact_categories WHERE category_name LIKE 'Air%';

SELECT p.id, pr.requirement_name, pp.permit_date FROM project_permits AS pp JOIN permit_requirements AS pr ON pp.permit_id = pr.requirement_id JOIN environmental_impact_assessment AS p ON pp.project_id = p.id;
